title: Program for Enhancing Understanding of Dementia and Community Integration Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance dementia patient support capabilities among medical/legal/technical professionals as community members. Smartphone-based educational environment

learning_goals: Learners can recognize three or more daily difficulties of dementia patients and propose empathetic response strategies
Learners can analyze and propose two community-level dementia-inclusive practice cases
Learners can utilize three specific communication strategies for supporting families of dementia patients

resources: Digital Collaboration Tool for Peer Assessment
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
